name: Merge Dice 2: Extreme Block
description:
Merge Dice 2: Extreme Master Block - Classic Triple Match & Puzzle Game is a challenging matching game. In the game, you need to blow your mind and merge 3 same numbers of Dice. When 3 dice are merged, you will get the higher Dice! Our puzzle game includes large numbers of fun. Challenge your mind, break your highest score, be a TOP on Leaderboard, and then you will find them easy and exciting!

KEY FEATURES:
- Various Dice on the board
- Easy rule to play: Only need to drag and drop the block of dice and merge 3 same dice!
- Powerful boosters to choose: Unlock tools to pass more quickly!
- Autosave and offline: Play at anytime and anywhere!
- Task focus and concentration enhance: Wonderful gameplay to train your brain!

HOW TO PLAY?
- Just drag and drop the blocks supported.
- Find three same dice connected to get higher dice!
- Use powerful tools as you want!
- Merge 3 Golden Dice to eliminate all the dice in square 3x3!
- Break your friend’s score one by one to become a master!

Now come to play this free puzzle game, Merge Dice 2: Extreme Tile Master! Prove you are a master at connecting and merging dice tiles!
Hope you have a wonderful time playing!
